step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Ensure you feel a gentle resistance.
Your hand opening was good. Try to open your fingers even wider next time for maximum effect.
You made a good fist and tightened your muscles. Focus on a strong, tight fist while inhaling.
Your hand opening during exhalation was mostly good. Ensure you fully relax your hand and fingers.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and open your hand wide when you exhale. Squeeze tightly into a fist as you inhale to help move fluid.
